system.description: Your gift for languages allows you to understand and communicate across linguistic barriers with surprising ease.
system.benefit: Character can derive basic meaning from languages they do not know, can also make Untrained Linguistics Skill Tests as if it were a non-specialist skill. (They can make the test, but at -20) If Rogue Trader or Earlier, can treat unknown languages as Untrained Basic Skills with -10 instead. In a Social Encounter, gain +20 to Opposed Tests when going against an opponent speaking in a different language.

specialAbilities.name: Linguistic Intuition
specialAbilities.description: You can derive basic meaning from languages you do not know. You can make untrained Linguistics skill tests as if it were a non-specialist skill (at -20 penalty, or -10 in Rogue Trader rules).

specialAbilities.name: Language Barrier Advantage
specialAbilities.description: In a Social Encounter, you gain +20 to Opposed tests when going against an opponent speaking in a different language.
